text: Jeremy Lee Renner (born January 7, 1971) is an American actor, singer, film producer. He is famous for his role in the movie The Avengers. In The Avengers, he plays Hawkeye, a.k.a. Clint Barton. He appeared largely in independent films, such as Dahmer and Neo Ned. Renner appeared in films, such as S.W.A.T. and 28 Weeks Later. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Stanislaus County, California Category:People from Modesto, California
title: Jeremy Renner
